xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 12 Sekkhattika » 12.7 Pañhāvāra » 12.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 12.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Sekkhattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
68.
1843Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava, anantare aṭṭha, samanantare aṭṭha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā aṭṭha, vigate aṭṭha, avigate terasa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1844Anulomaṃ.
<< 12.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
